name: job-portal-monorepo
description: Modern Job Portal - 51,480 LOC | 150+ Features | Production Ready

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix=backend && npm run build --prefix=frontend
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:prod --prefix=backend && npm run build --prefix=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix=backend && npm run test --prefix=frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix=backend && npm run test:coverage --prefix=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix=backend && npm run lint --prefix=frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix=backend && npm run type-check --prefix=frontend

author: Job Portal Team
